name: refresh_booking
description: Service search and booking parameters for REFRESH clinic appointments. The LLM should extract service information from customer conversations and format it according to the specified tool type.

properties.description: The tool function to call: "search_service" to find services by name, "find_soonest_slot" to get earliest available appointment, "get_services_overview" to show popular services, "get_opening_hours" for clinic hours.
Service name to search for. Extract customer's request for specific treatments like "hydrafacial", "peeling", "laserová epilácia", "institut esthederm", etc. Required only for search_service tool.
Service ID from previous search results. Use the serviceId returned by search_service when customer selects a specific service. Required for find_soonest_slot tool.
Worker preference: "-1" for any available worker, "18204" for Janka, "30224" for Veronika. Use -1 unless customer specifically requests a worker.
